account.company_news_blank: Do you need to broadcast an announcement or a news to every employee of Behaviour? You can do so here!
account.company_news_new_content_help: Everyone in the company will be able to read this news. Make sure you are not saying something silly.
account.company_news_new_title_help: Keep it short, interesting. Also, add an emoji.
account.company_news_success_destroy: The company news has been deleted with success.
account.employee_log_morale_logged: Added an emotion on how the day went.
account.employee_log_time_off_created: Added a new time off for :date.
account.employee_new_administrator_desc: Can do everything, including account management.
account.employee_new_hr_desc: Have access to most features, including reading and writing private information, but can't manage the account itself.
account.employee_new_send_email: Send an email to this person with a link to setup the account.
account.employee_new_send_email_optional: This is optional - you will be able to invite this person later.
account.employee_new_user_desc: Can see all teams and employees, but can not manage the account or read private information.
account.employee_statuses_blank: Statuses are terms that describe the employment status of an employee. Like full-time, part-time, etc....
account.employee_statuses_number_positions: {company} has one employee status. | {company} has {count} employee statuses.
account.employee_statuses_success_destroy: The employee status has been destroyed
account.employee_statuses_success_new: The employee status has been created
account.employee_statuses_success_update: The employee status has been updated
account.flow_new_action_label_reports: the direct report(s) of the employee
account.flow_new_action_notification_confirmatio: Are you sure? This will alert all the employees of the company.
account.flow_new_action_notification_search_hint: Type the first letters of the name
account.flow_new_flow: What is the name of the flow?
account.flow_new_help: This is an internal name, only used to identify the flow.
account.flow_new_type_employee_joins_team: An employee is added to a team
account.flow_new_type_employee_leaves_team: An employee is removed from a team
account.flow_new_type_employee_new_position: An employee has a new position
account.flow_new_type_employee_returns_holidays: An employee comes back from holidays
account.flow_new_type_employee_returns_leave: An employee returns from a leave
account.flows_blank: Flows lets you define how the system should react when something in the company happens. It’s... quite powerful.
account.home_audit_log: View audit log to see who has done what
account.home_role_administrator: As an administrator, you can…
account.home_role_owner: As an owner, you can…
account.log_company_pto_policy_created: Created a company PTO policy for :year.
account.log_company_pto_policy_updated: Updated the company PTO policy for the year :year.
account.log_company_time_off_created: Added a new time off for :date.
account.log_employee_invited_to_become_user: Sent an invitation to :employee to join the company.
account.log_employee_morale_logged: Added an emotion on how the day went.
account.log_employee_status_assigned: Assigned the employee status called :name to :employee.
account.log_employee_status_removed: Removed the employee status called :name from :employee.
account.log_employee_status_updated: Updated the name of the employee status from :former_name to :new_name.
account.log_position_updated: Updated the position formely called :former_name to :new_name.
account.log_team_description_cleared: Cleared the description of the team called :name.
account.log_team_description_set: Set the description of the team called :name.
account.log_team_news_created: Wrote a news called :news_name for the team called :name.
account.log_team_news_destroyed: Deleted the news called :news_name for the team called :name.
account.log_team_news_updated: Updated the news called :news_name for the team called :name.
account.log_team_useful_link_created: Added a link called :link_name to the team called :name.
account.log_team_useful_link_destroyed: Removed the link called :link_name to the team called :name.
account.log_team_useful_link_updated: Updated the link called :link_name to the team called :name.
account.notification_dummy_data_generated: Dummy data have been generated for :name.
account.positions_blank: Positions are terms that describe in a few words what an employee does. Like Marketing Coordinator for example.
account.pto_policies_edit_calendar_help: Note: this will affect all employees. We’ll recalculate the balance of holidays for all your employees based any changes you would do here.
account.pto_policies_edit_click_calendar: Add/remove holidays by clicking in a day in the calendar below
account.pto_policies_edit_default_employee_setti: These are the default settings that will be applied to new employees. This won’t affect existing employees.
account.pto_policies_edit_title_1: As software makers, we think it’s our responsability to promote a culture where employees are actually trusted and autonomous.
account.pto_policies_edit_title_2: We have a very limited set of features around Paid Time Offs (a barbaric name that refers to the holidays employees are allowed to take each year). On purpose. Click here to read more about our way of thinking.
account.pto_policies_edit_title_3: The only setting we need to know is the amount of working days each year has, so we can calculate how much holidays the employees gain each day.
account.pto_policies_edit_title_4: You just need to make sure that for each one of those years below, the amount of days actually worked is correct for your country.
account.pto_policies_edit_total: Employees will have to work a total of {totalWorkedDays} in {year}.
account.pto_policies_legend_: Add/remove holidays by clicking in a day in the calendar below
account.pto_policies_stat_default_holidays: default amount of holidays per employee
account.teams_blank: Teams are a great way for groups of people in your company to work together in officelife.

app.header_search_placeholder: Find an employee or a team by name

auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.invitation_link_already_accepted: This invitation has already been accepted. Please sign in to your account.
auth.invitation_unlogged_choice_account_desc: Use this option if you don't have an account
auth.invitation_unlogged_choice_login_desc: Use this option if you already have an account on OfficeLife
auth.invitation_unlogged_create_account_inste: Login with an existing account instead.
auth.invitation_unlogged_desc: To accept the invitation, use one of these two options below.
auth.invitation_unlogged_title: You have been invited to join the human resource software used by {name}.
auth.register_email_help: We'll never spam. You'll receive one email to confirm your email address once you sign up, and won't be added to any nasty email marketing campaigns, nor will you receive emails from a sales team.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.

company.new_name: What is the name of the company?

dashboard.morale_already_logged: You have already indicated how you felt today. Come back tomorrow!
dashboard.morale_rules: You can vote once per day, and you can’t edit your vote. Your vote will be completely anonymous.
dashboard.morale_success_message: Thanks for telling us how you feel.

dashboard.team_not_allowed: You are not allowed to view this team.

dashboard.worklog_already_logged: You have already logged your work today.
dashboard.worklog_entry_description: Your manager and your team members (if you are assigned to a team) will be able to read this status. Also, you won’t be able to edit this status once it’s submitted.
dashboard.worklog_placeholder: Let your coworkers know what you’ve been up to today.

employee.description_text_help: Everyone in the company will be able to read this when visiting your profile.
employee.description_text_title: How would you describe yourself? What are your passions?
employee.edit_information_address_help: Only administrators and HR will be able to see the complete address. Any other people will be able to see the city and country.
employee.hierarchy_blank: Add a manager or a direct report to position this employee within the company.

employee.hierarchy_modal_remove_direct_report_suc: The direct report has been unassigned

employee.location_privacy_information: Only you and HR can view your complete address.
employee.status_modal_blank_title: There is no employee status defined in this account yet.

team.members_add_input_help: Find someone to add to the team
team.members_blank: There are no members in this team yet 😱
team.news_blank: No one has written a news on this team yet 😢
team.team_list_blank: Teams are a great way for groups of people in your company to work together in Officelife. Teams can be added in your Adminland.
team.team_news_new_content_help: Do you have anything interesting to share to the team? Everyone in the team, as well as everyone in the company, will be able to read this.
team.team_news_new_title_help: Give it a punchy name so people will actually read it

validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.

between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.

validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
validation.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.

gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.
gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.

gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.
gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value kilobytes.
gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value.
gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value characters.

validation.in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.

lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.
lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.

lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.
lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value kilobytes.
lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value.
lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value characters.

max.array: The :attribute may not have more than :max items.
max.file: The :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.numeric: The :attribute may not be greater than :max.
max.string: The :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.

validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.

min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.

validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
validation.starts_with: The :attribute must start with one of the following: :values
validation.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid zone.
validation.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
